text: Published 7:31 pm Saturday, April 12, 2025 The Austin softball team split a doubleheader with Red Wing as the Packers took the first game 8-6 before dropping the nightcap 5-2 in Todd Park Saturday. Austin head coach Lisa Lage was pleased with the play of her team. “While we wanted to win both, it was a great experience to see what it takes to play two games back to back, like we will have to do in the section tournament,” Lage said. “Kate Klouse had a wonderful day at the plate. She didn’t strike out once, she walked once and put the ball in play every other time. Adi Cline had a great day, too.” Email newsletter signup The Packers are now 3-4 overall. Austin 8, Red Wing 6 Austin pitching: KJ Schaefer (W) 7 IP, 11 H, 1 BB, 6 R, 5 ER, 4 K Austin hitting: Charlee Cunningham, 1-for-4, double, RBI, R; Katelynn Klouse, 1-for-3, RBI, R; Quinn Osgood, 1-for-4, RBI; KJ Schaefer, 2-for-4, RBI; Lexi Brede, 2-for-2, 2 R, BB; Jenna Hetzel, 1-for-4, R; Morgan Cass, 1-for-4, RBI, R, BB; Adi Cline, 1-for-3, double, 3 RBIs, R; Lauren Bowe, 2-for-2, triple, R Red Wing 5, Austin 2 Austin pitching: KJ Schaefer (L) 7 IP, 8 H, 5 ER, 4 K Austin hitting: Cunningham, 3-for-4, R; Klouse, 1-for-4; Osgood, 1-for-3, triple, RBI, BB; Schaefer, 2-for-3, double, BB; Jenna Hetzel, 0-for-2, BB; Cass, 1-for-3, RBI; Bowe, 1-for-2, BB More RSS General
html:
Published 7:31 pm Saturday, April 12, 2025

The Austin softball team split a doubleheader with Red Wing as the Packers took the first game 8-6 before dropping the nightcap 5-2 in Todd Park Saturday.

Austin head coach Lisa Lage was pleased with the play of her team.

“While we wanted to win both, it was a great experience to see what it takes to play two games back to back, like we will have to do in the section tournament,” Lage said. “Kate Klouse had a wonderful day at the plate. She didn’t strike out once, she walked once and put the ball in play every other time. Adi Cline had a great day, too.”

Email newsletter signup

The Packers are now 3-4 overall.

Austin 8, Red Wing 6

Austin pitching: KJ Schaefer (W) 7 IP, 11 H, 1 BB, 6 R, 5 ER, 4 K

Austin hitting: Charlee Cunningham, 1-for-4, double, RBI, R; Katelynn Klouse, 1-for-3, RBI, R; Quinn Osgood, 1-for-4, RBI; KJ Schaefer, 2-for-4, RBI; Lexi Brede, 2-for-2, 2 R, BB; Jenna Hetzel, 1-for-4, R; Morgan Cass, 1-for-4, RBI, R, BB; Adi Cline, 1-for-3, double, 3 RBIs, R; Lauren Bowe, 2-for-2, triple, R

Red Wing 5, Austin 2

Austin pitching: KJ Schaefer (L) 7 IP, 8 H, 5 ER, 4 K

Austin hitting: Cunningham, 3-for-4, R; Klouse, 1-for-4; Osgood, 1-for-3, triple, RBI, BB; Schaefer, 2-for-3, double, BB; Jenna Hetzel, 0-for-2, BB; Cass, 1-for-3, RBI; Bowe, 1-for-2, BB

More RSS General
